html:
• Home
  • Careers

Join us live on Thursday, June 31, and learn about how she's providing a new retail experience in NYC.

  • Author:

    Janelle Sessoms

  • Publish date:

    Jul 25, 2025

Janelle here. I'm so excited to share that I'll be chatting with Laura Baker, co-founder and managing director of Essx, on The Fashionista Network. But here's the best part: I want you to join us! It's your opportunity to interact live with us, ask questions and be part of the show.

We'll discuss the process of opening a designer concept store, navigating retail's rocky landscape, appealing to the modern in-person shopper and more.

This conversation will be hosted on The Fashionista Network powered by interactive media platform Fireside, and you'll get the chance to participate and join the stage with video to ask questions directly. Learn more about The Fashionista Network here.

Scroll to Continue

You don't want to miss this show on Thursday, June 31 at 11:00 a.m. PT / 2:00 p.m. ET. Sign up for free access now (and don't forget to become a member to access all of our members-only shows and perks as well).
